name: Sloopidoop

trait.name: Amphibious
text: Sloopidoop can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
text: Sloopidoop can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
text: Sloopidoop has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, Sloopidoop has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Sloopidoop is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Sloopidoop has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon
• 5th level (2 slots): mass cure wounds, scrying

action.name: Scepter
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

spells: guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith, hold person, spiritual weapon, spirit guardians, tongues, control water, divination, mass cure wounds, scrying
description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 29
